Read entries module

read_entries.create_object_KW(par, keyword_type)[source]

Creates and returns an object of a specific keyword type based on the provided integer identifier.

Parameters:

  • par (str) – The parameter value to be used for creating the keyword object.

  • keyword_type (int) – An integer identifier that specifies the type of keyword object to create.

Returns:

An instance of a keyword object corresponding to the provided identifier.

Return type:

object

read_entries.extract_lines_from_text_widget(text)[source]

Extracts all lines of text from a Text widget and returns them as a list.

Args: text_widget (tk.Text): The Text widget from which to extract lines. Returns: list A list containing each line of text as a separate string.

Return type:

list

read_entries.initialize_simulation_parameters(object_of_class)[source]

Initializes the essential simulation parameters by creating a MuSpinInput object and setting up various parameters such as name, spins, and time based on user input.

Args: handler (object): An instance of a class that manages UI elements and holds parameter values
